name: The Swarm
tagline: Relationships. Are. Back.
description: The next big thing in tech? Relationships. In the age of AI, humans want to work with other humans. Harness the power of your extended company network. Leverage your trusted relationships to close more deals and grow faster. Join The Swarm.

name: Sherlock
tagline: Stop AI-assisted cheating in remote interviews
description: Sherlock is an AI-agent that stops AI-assisted cheating during remote interviews. Sherlock ensures interview integrity by detecting AI-assisted cheating through vision, hearing, and reasoningâ€” letting you focus on quality conversations.

name: Helix
tagline: Your collaborative AI coding agent
description: AI Coding Agent which helps you write production quality code. It generates code, runs commands, and debugs existing code all on its own. With built-in automation and intuitive UI, Helix helps you build enterprise grade softwares.

name: AI Command Bar
tagline: Turn your user's words into actions
description: Imagine Spotlight with superpowers... That is what Stepsailor's AI Command Bar is aiming for. Let your user describe what they want to do, and the command bar will automatically run the required actions within your product. No need for prompt engineering.

name: GitHub MCP Server
tagline: The Official MCP Bridge to GitHub APIs
description: GitHub's official MCP Server. Lets AI agents securely call GitHub APIs locally. Integrates with VS Code.

name: Okareo
tagline: Error discovery & evaluation for AI Agents
description: Real-time LLM behavioral alerts and structured debugging for agents and RAGs

name: Blur It 5.0
tagline: Blur sensitive info on a webpage effortlessly
description: Worried about exposing private info during screen shares? Blur It has your back. This powerful Chrome extension instantly blurs sensitive text, forms, and images.

name: Duocook
tagline: The recipe app for couples
description: Duocook helps couples discover recipes, plan meals, and learn each otherâ€™s tastes through fun food quizzes. Save and import recipes from anywhere, sync your plans, and turn mealtime into quality timeâ€”no more â€œWhat should we eat tonight?

name: BirdTab
tagline: Find zen with birds in every new Chrome tab
description: Escape the digital noise with BirdTab. Each new Chrome tab delivers stunning bird photography, educational facts, and authentic bird songs - turning browsing breaks into mindful moments.

name: Circle Camera
tagline: Minimalist webcam app that displays your camera in a circle.
description: Circle Camera. A sleek, minimalist webcam app Display your webcam feed in a perfect circle, ideal for screen recordings and presentations

name: Keep to Notes
tagline: Securely migrate your Google Keep Notes to Apple & Evernote.
description: Switching from Google Keep to Apple Notes or Evernote? Keep to Notes makes it simple and secure! This open source, browser-based tool converts your Google Keep export (from Google Takeout) directly into the standardenex format, ready for easy import.

name: Metigan
tagline: Reliable mass email delivery with API integration
description: Metigan is an intuitive platform for bulk email sending, offering scheduled emails, domain personalization, and templates. With advanced analytics and API integration, itâ€™s the perfect solution for businesses looking for simplicity, control, and results.

name: IBM z17
tagline: The Mainframe Reimagined for the AI Era
description: IBM z17, the new mainframe built for AI. Features Telum II processor & upcoming Spyre accelerator for on-prem inference, GenAI, and agentic AI with high security & availability.

name: Relationchips
tagline: AI data agent to query, visualize and activate your data.
description: Connect your SaaS tools and database in minutes, explore data in natural language, build always-up-to-date dashboards, and trigger alerts or actions based on your business logic â€” all without writing a single line of SQL.

name: ScoreGenius
tagline: Worldâ€™s most accurate football betting prediction tool
description: Are you looking for a way to gain an unfair advantage in football betting? Our AI analyzes thousands of data points to predict the most accurate outcome of football matches.

name: Buildzero
tagline: Your AI Co-founder to Validate PMF
description: Buildzero helps founders validate startup ideas using AI-powered voice calls. Instantly pitch your concept, gather real feedback, and get actionable insightsâ€”before writing a single line of code.

name: ChronoFlow
tagline: Automate recruitment, build human connections
description: Chronoflow empowers recruiters to engage candidates, manage client relationships, and streamline all hiring tasks in one place, reducing time to hire and providing the best candidate experience.

name: WaitLaunch
tagline: Create and deploy stunning waitlists in minutes.
description: Have a banger idea ? Don't waste time building the product without validating it, don't waste hours creating a waitlist and buying the domain. WaitLaunch creates stunning waitlists, deploy them live hosted on waitlaunch.com, no ugly domain, no time wasted.

name: Pennyflo
tagline: Contract-to-invoice in seconds & get paid faster
description: Automating the contract-to-invoice workflow and chase the invoices to get-paid faster using AI agents.

name: ClawCloud Run
tagline: Cloud-native deployment platform with GitOps workflows
description: ClawCloud Run delivers a high-performance, lightweight cloud-native deployment platform with integrated GitOps workflows, native Docker/Kubernetes support, and seamless GitHub integration. Trusted by thousands of development teams worldwide.
